trans-unit.source: Release notes for Application Insights for .NET
trans-unit.target: Release notes for Application Insights for .NET

trans-unit.source: The latest updates.
trans-unit.target: The latest updates.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>Application Insights SDK for .NET</linkText><title></title> sends telemetry about your live app to <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title>, where you can analyze its usage and performance.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>Application Insights SDK for .NET</linkText><title></title> sends telemetry about your live app to <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title>, where you can analyze its usage and performance.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Get started with Application Insights for .NET</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Get started with Application Insights for .NET</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: After you upgrade, you'll need to merge back any customizations you made to ApplicationInsights.config.
trans-unit.target: After you upgrade, you'll need to merge back any customizations you made to ApplicationInsights.config.

trans-unit.source: If you're unsure whether you customized it, create a new project, add Application Insights to it, and compare your .config file with the one in the new project.
trans-unit.target: If you're unsure whether you customized it, create a new project, add Application Insights to it, and compare your .config file with the one in the new project.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of any differences.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of any differences.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, right-click your project and choose Manage NuGet packages.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, right-click your project and choose Manage NuGet packages.

trans-unit.source: Set the filter to show installed packages.
trans-unit.target: Set the filter to show installed packages.

trans-unit.source: Select Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web and choose Upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Select Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web and choose Upgrade.

trans-unit.source: (This will also upgrade all the dependent packages.)
trans-unit.target: (This will also upgrade all the dependent packages.)

trans-unit.source: Compare ApplicationInsights.config with the old copy.
trans-unit.target: Compare ApplicationInsights.config with the old copy.

trans-unit.source: Most of the changes you'll see are because we removed some modules and made others parameterizable.
trans-unit.target: Most of the changes you'll see are because we removed some modules and made others parameterizable.

trans-unit.source: Reinstate any customizations you made to the old file.
trans-unit.target: Reinstate any customizations you made to the old file.

trans-unit.source: Rebuild your solution.
trans-unit.target: Rebuild your solution.

trans-unit.source: Telemetry initializers that do not have dependencies on ASP.NET libraries were moved from Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web to the new dependency nuget Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsServer
trans-unit.target: Telemetry initializers that do not have dependencies on ASP.NET libraries were moved from Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web to the new dependency nuget Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsServer

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web.dll was renamed on Microsoft.AI.Web.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web.dll was renamed on Microsoft.AI.Web.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web.TelemetryChannel nuget was renamed on Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsServer.TelemetryChannel.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web.TelemetryChannel nuget was renamed on Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsServer.TelemetryChannel.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web.TelemetryChannel assembly was renamed on Microsoft.AI.ServerTelemetryChannel.dll.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web.TelemetryChannel assembly was renamed on Microsoft.AI.ServerTelemetryChannel.dll.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web.TelemetryChannel class was renamed on Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsServer.TelemetryChannel.ServerTelemetryChannel.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web.TelemetryChannel class was renamed on Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.WindowsServer.TelemetryChannel.ServerTelemetryChannel.

trans-unit.source: All namespaces that are part of Web SDK were changed to exclude Extensibility part.
trans-unit.target: All namespaces that are part of Web SDK were changed to exclude Extensibility part.

trans-unit.source: That includes all telemetry initializers in ApplicationInsights.config and ApplicationInsightsWebTracking module in web.config.
trans-unit.target: That includes all telemetry initializers in ApplicationInsights.config and ApplicationInsightsWebTracking module in web.config.

trans-unit.source: Dependencies collected using runtime instrumentation agent (enabled via Status Monitor or Azure WebSite extension) will not be marked as asynchronous if there are no HttpContext.Current on the thread.
trans-unit.target: Dependencies collected using runtime instrumentation agent (enabled via Status Monitor or Azure WebSite extension) will not be marked as asynchronous if there are no HttpContext.Current on the thread.

trans-unit.source: Property SamplingRatio of DependencyTrackingTelemetryModule does nothing and marked as obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Property SamplingRatio of DependencyTrackingTelemetryModule does nothing and marked as obsolete.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.PerfCounterCollector assembly was renamed on Microsoft.AI.PerfCounterCollector
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.PerfCounterCollector assembly was renamed on Microsoft.AI.PerfCounterCollector

trans-unit.source: Several minor bug fixes in Web and Devices SDKs
trans-unit.target: Several minor bug fixes in Web and Devices SDKs

trans-unit.source: New telemetry type DependencyTelemetry was added which can be used to send information about dependency calls from application (like SQL, HTTP calls etc).
trans-unit.target: New telemetry type DependencyTelemetry was added which can be used to send information about dependency calls from application (like SQL, HTTP calls etc).

trans-unit.source: New overload method TelemetryClient.TrackDependency was added that allows you to send information about dependency calls.
trans-unit.target: New overload method TelemetryClient.TrackDependency was added that allows you to send information about dependency calls.

trans-unit.source: Fixed NullReferenceException thrown by diagnostics module when TelemetryConfiguration.CreateDefault is used.
trans-unit.target: Fixed NullReferenceException thrown by diagnostics module when TelemetryConfiguration.CreateDefault is used.

trans-unit.source: Moved telemetry initializers and telemetry modules from separate sub-namespaces to the root Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web namespace.
trans-unit.target: Moved telemetry initializers and telemetry modules from separate sub-namespaces to the root Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web namespace.

trans-unit.source: Removed "Web" prefix from names of telemetry initializers and telemetry modules because it is already included in the Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web namespace name.
trans-unit.target: Removed "Web" prefix from names of telemetry initializers and telemetry modules because it is already included in the Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web namespace name.

trans-unit.source: Moved DeviceContextInitializer from the Microsoft.ApplicationInsights assembly to the Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web assembly and converted it to an ITelemetryInitializer.
trans-unit.target: Moved DeviceContextInitializer from the Microsoft.ApplicationInsights assembly to the Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Web assembly and converted it to an ITelemetryInitializer.

trans-unit.source: Change namespace and assembly names from Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.RuntimeTelemetry to Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.DependencyCollector for consistency with the name of the NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: Change namespace and assembly names from Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.RuntimeTelemetry to Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.DependencyCollector for consistency with the name of the NuGet package.

trans-unit.source: Rename RemoteDependencyModule to DependencyTrackingTelemetryModule.
trans-unit.target: Rename RemoteDependencyModule to DependencyTrackingTelemetryModule.

trans-unit.source: Rename CustomPerformanceCounterCollectionRequest to PerformanceCounterCollectionRequest.
trans-unit.target: Rename CustomPerformanceCounterCollectionRequest to PerformanceCounterCollectionRequest.

trans-unit.source: Removed dependency to EventSource NuGet for the framework 4.5 applications.
trans-unit.target: Removed dependency to EventSource NuGet for the framework 4.5 applications.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous User and Session cookies will not be generated on server side.
trans-unit.target: Anonymous User and Session cookies will not be generated on server side.

trans-unit.source: To implement user and session tracking for web apps, instrumentation with JS SDK is now required – cookies from JavaScript SDK are still respected.
trans-unit.target: To implement user and session tracking for web apps, instrumentation with JS SDK is now required – cookies from JavaScript SDK are still respected.

trans-unit.source: Telemetry modules WebSessionTrackingTelemetryModule and WebUserTrackingTelemetryModule are no longer supported and were removed from ApplicationInsights.config file.
trans-unit.target: Telemetry modules WebSessionTrackingTelemetryModule and WebUserTrackingTelemetryModule are no longer supported and were removed from ApplicationInsights.config file.

trans-unit.source: Note that this change may cause a significant restatement of user and session counts as only user-originated sessions are being counted now.
trans-unit.target: Note that this change may cause a significant restatement of user and session counts as only user-originated sessions are being counted now.

trans-unit.source: OSVersion is no longer populuated by SDK by default.
trans-unit.target: OSVersion is no longer populuated by SDK by default.

trans-unit.source: When empty, OS and OSVersion is calculated by Application Insights pipeline, based on the user agent.
trans-unit.target: When empty, OS and OSVersion is calculated by Application Insights pipeline, based on the user agent.

trans-unit.source: Persistence channel optimized for high-load scenarios is used for web SDK.
trans-unit.target: Persistence channel optimized for high-load scenarios is used for web SDK.

trans-unit.source: "Spiral of death" issue fixed.
trans-unit.target: "Spiral of death" issue fixed.

trans-unit.source: Spiral of death is a condition when spike in telemetry items count that greatly exceeds throttling limit on endpoint will lead to retry after certain time and will be throttled during retry again.
trans-unit.target: Spiral of death is a condition when spike in telemetry items count that greatly exceeds throttling limit on endpoint will lead to retry after certain time and will be throttled during retry again.

trans-unit.source: Developer Mode is optimized for production.
trans-unit.target: Developer Mode is optimized for production.

trans-unit.source: If left by mistake it will not cause as big overhead as before attempting to output additional information.
trans-unit.target: If left by mistake it will not cause as big overhead as before attempting to output additional information.

trans-unit.source: Developer Mode by default will only be enabled when application is under debugger.
trans-unit.target: Developer Mode by default will only be enabled when application is under debugger.

trans-unit.source: You can override it using DeveloperMode property of ITelemetryChannel interface.
trans-unit.target: You can override it using DeveloperMode property of ITelemetryChannel interface.

trans-unit.source: 2015-04-28 preview
trans-unit.target: 2015-04-28 preview

trans-unit.source: SDK now supports DNX target platform to enable monitoring of <linkText>.NET Core framework</linkText><title></title> applications.
trans-unit.target: SDK now supports DNX target platform to enable monitoring of <linkText>.NET Core framework</linkText><title></title> applications.

trans-unit.source: Instances of TelemetryClient do not cache Instrumentation Key anymore.
trans-unit.target: Instances of TelemetryClient do not cache Instrumentation Key anymore.

trans-unit.source: Now if instrumentation key wasn't set in TelemetryClient explicitly InstrumentationKey will return null.
trans-unit.target: Now if instrumentation key wasn't set in TelemetryClient explicitly InstrumentationKey will return null.

trans-unit.source: It fixes an issue when you set TelemetryConfiguration.Active.InstrumentationKey after some telemetry was already collected, telemetry modules like dependency collector, web requests data collection and performance counters collector will use new instrumentation key.
trans-unit.target: It fixes an issue when you set TelemetryConfiguration.Active.InstrumentationKey after some telemetry was already collected, telemetry modules like dependency collector, web requests data collection and performance counters collector will use new instrumentation key.

trans-unit.source: New property Operation.SyntheticSource now available on TelemetryContext.
trans-unit.target: New property Operation.SyntheticSource now available on TelemetryContext.

trans-unit.source: Now you can mark your telemetry items as "not a real user traffic" and specify how this traffic was generated.
trans-unit.target: Now you can mark your telemetry items as "not a real user traffic" and specify how this traffic was generated.

trans-unit.source: As an example by setting this property you can distinguish traffic from your test automation from load test traffic.
trans-unit.target: As an example by setting this property you can distinguish traffic from your test automation from load test traffic.

trans-unit.source: Channel logic was moved to the separate NuGet called Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.PersistenceChannel.
trans-unit.target: Channel logic was moved to the separate NuGet called Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.PersistenceChannel.

trans-unit.source: Default channel is now called InMemoryChannel
trans-unit.target: Default channel is now called InMemoryChannel

trans-unit.source: New method TelemetryClient.Flush allows to flush telemetry items from the buffer synchronously
trans-unit.target: New method TelemetryClient.Flush allows to flush telemetry items from the buffer synchronously

trans-unit.source: No release notes for older versions available.
trans-unit.target: No release notes for older versions available.
